metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28852 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting in version 9.5.0 and prior to versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7, a user with dashboard administration rights may hack the dashboard form to store malicious code that will be executed when other users will use the related dashboard. Versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7 contain a patch for this issue.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
